<?php
/**
 * contact form
 *
 */
class PhenotypeInclude_1104 extends PhenotypeInclude
{

	public $id = 1104;

	function display()
	{
		global $myRequest;

		if ($myRequest->get("action")=="sendForm")
		{
			$this->sendForm();
		}
		else
		{
			// initialize smarty access, allocate $mySmarty and $TPL_XY placeholder
			eval ($this->initRendering());

			$this->displayFormHeader();
			$this->displayFormJSChecks();

			echo $mySmarty->fetch($TPL_FORM);

			$this->displayFormFooter();
		}
	}

	function displayFormHeader()
	{
		global $myPage;

		echo '<form action="index.php" method="post" enctype="multipart/form-data" onsubmit="return formcheck();" name="form1">';
		echo '<input type="hidden" name="id" value="' . $myPage->id .'"/>';
		echo '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="sendForm"/>';
	}

	function displayFormJSChecks()
	{
		?>
		<script type="text/javascript">
		function formcheck()
		{
			if (!check_text ('name','Please enter your name.')){return false};
			if (!check_email ('email','Pleaser enter your email address.','Please check your email address. It seems to be wrong.')){return false};
		}
		function check_text(feld,meldung){  if (document.forms.form1[feld].value=='')  {    alert (meldung);document.forms.form1[feld].focus();return false;  }  return true;}

		function check_email(feld,meldung1,meldung2){  email = document.forms.form1[feld].value;  if (email=='')  {    alert (meldung1);document.forms.form1[feld].focus();return false;   }  if (email.indexOf('@')==-1)  {    alert (meldung2);document.forms.form1[feld].focus();return false;   }   if (email.indexOf('.')==-1)  {    alert (meldung2);document.forms.form1[feld].focus();return false;   }      return true;}

		function check_2text(feld1,feld2,meldung){  if ((document.forms.form1[feld1].value=='') &(document.forms.form1[feld2].value==''))  {    alert (meldung);document.forms.form1[feld1].focus();return false;  }  return true;}

		function check_selection(feld,meldung){  if (document.forms.form1[feld].selectedIndex==0)  {    alert (meldung);document.forms.form1[feld].focus();return false;   }  return true;}

		function check_box(feld,meldung){  if (!document.forms.form1[feld].checked)  {    alert (meldung);return false;   }  return true;}

		function check_number(feld,meldung){  if (isNaN(document.forms.form1[feld].value))  {    alert (meldung);document.forms.form1[feld].focus();return false;  }  return true;}
	</script>
		<?php
	}

	function displayFormFooter()
	{
		echo '</form>';
	}

	function sendForm()
	{
		global $myRequest;
		global $myApp;

		$mail = "======================================================\n";
		$mail .= "New entry in contact form\n";
		$mail .= "------------------------------------------------------\n";
		$mail .= "Date   : ".localeDate(time())."\n";
		$mail .= "------------------------------------------------------\n";
		$mail .= "IP     : ".$_SERVER["REMOTE_ADDR"]."\n";
		$mail .= "Lookup : ".gethostbyaddr($_SERVER["REMOTE_ADDR"])."\n";
		$mail .= "------------------------------------------------------\n";
		$mail .= "Server : ".$_SERVER["HTTP_HOST"]."\n";
		$mail .= "------------------------------------------------------\n";
		$mail .= "Name   : ".$myRequest->get("name")."\n";
		$mail .= "------------------------------------------------------\n";
		$mail .= "------------------------------------------------------\n";
		$mail .= "Email  : ".$myRequest->get("email")."\n";
		$mail .= "------------------------------------------------------\n";
		$mail .= "Phone  : ".$myRequest->get("phone")."\n";
		$mail .= "------------------------------------------------------\n";
		$mail .= "Message: \n\n".$myRequest->get("message")."\n";
		$mail .= "------------------------------------------------------\n";
		$mail .= "======================================================\n\n\n";

		$myCO = new PhenotypeContent_1102();
		$myCO->addNew(3); // User WWW
		$myCO->set("bez", "Entry from ".$myRequest->get("name"));
		$myCO->set("mail", $mail);
		$myCO->store();

		if ($myApp->contact_email_to!="" AND $myApp->contact_email_from!="")
		{
			if (@mail($myApp->contact_email_to, "New entry in contact form", $mail, $myApp->contact_email_from))
			{
				// Notwendig, um die Smartyengine richtig zu initialisieren
				eval ($this->initRendering());
				echo $mySmarty->fetch($TPL_THANKYOU);
				return;
			}
		}

		eval ($this->initRendering());
		echo $mySmarty->fetch($TPL_ERROR);

	}

}
?>
